short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sports Supercar wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Supercar background. Supercar wallpaper themes for Sports car fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Switch Supercar wallpapers every time you open a new tab.
2. Choose or favorite a Supercar background from the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media profiles.
5. Automatic display of the current date and time.
6. Create new notes for your tasks.
7. Quick links to frequently visited websites.
8. Streamlined access to your bookmarks.
9. Add sites to the Shortcut panel for faster access.
10. Quick links to Google applications.
11. Easy access to additional themes.
12. Simplified social media sharing.
13. Download wallpapers quickly.
14. Fast access to gaming.
15. Activate dynamic animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks on your new Supercar tab.
